actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 410 of title 38, United States Code, to provide a statutory presumption of service-connected death of any veteran who has been rated totally disabled by reason of service-connected disability for 10 or more years.

summary.text: Provides for a statutory presumption of service-connected death if any veteran who has been rated totally disabled by reason of service-connected disability for ten or more years. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 410).

titles.title: A bill to amend section 410 of title 38, United States Code, to provide a statutory presumption of service-connected death of any veteran who has been rated totally disabled by reason of service-connected disability for 10 or more years.
